title: Distributed Database Systems
subject: CSE
description: Distributed database design, query processing, and transaction processing. Distributed database architectures and interoperability. Emerging technology.

title: Fundamentals of Statistical Learning and Pattern Recognition
subject: CSE
description: Concepts of statistical pattern recognition, Bayesian decision theory, parameter estimation, discriminant analysis, basics of artificial neural networks, basics of data clustering. Knowledge of college-level calculus, linear algebra, basic probability theory and proficiency in computer programming is necessary to be successful in this course.

title: Data Visualization
subject: CSE
description: Amidst the information flood in which we are currently immersed, visualizations can be a well-placed treetop. The rise of big data has the potential to inform decisions, and visual representations can play a crucial intermediate role in our daily information consumption. Covers techniques and algorithms for creating effective visualizations based on principles from graphic design, visual art, perceptual psychology and cognitive science to enhance the understanding of complex data.

title: Just For Test
subject: EEE
description: Just for testing. Something ramdom. Meaningless. Don't care

title: Advanced Machine Learning
subject: CSE
description: An advanced course covering state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms, including deep learning, reinforcement learning, and unsupervised learning techniques.

title: Introduction to Computer Vision
subject: CSE
description: Basic concepts and techniques in computer vision, including image processing, feature extraction, object detection, and recognition.

title: Principles of Artificial Intelligence
subject: CSE
description: Explores foundational principles of AI, covering search algorithms, knowledge representation, logical reasoning, and machine learning.

title: Natural Language Processing
subject: CSE
description: Covers computational techniques for processing and understanding human language, including text classification, language modeling, and sequence tagging.

title: Big Data Analytics
subject: CSE
description: Techniques for managing, processing, and analyzing large datasets. Topics include data mining, machine learning, and scalable data analysis.

title: Software Engineering Principles
subject: CSE
description: An introduction to software development methodologies, including Agile, design patterns, and best practices in software engineering.

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
subject: CSE
description: Basics of cybersecurity including network security, cryptography, threat analysis, and secure software design.

title: Database Systems
subject: CSE
description: Covers relational database design, SQL, normalization, and introduction to non-relational databases.

title: Human-Computer Interaction
subject: CSE
description: Focuses on designing user-friendly interfaces, usability testing, and interaction design.

title: Fundamentals of Robotics
subject: CSE
description: Introduction to robotics covering kinematics, motion planning, sensor integration, and robot control.

title: Introduction to Distributed Systems
subject: CSE
description: Basics of distributed systems, covering communication protocols, fault tolerance, and distributed data storage.

title: Embedded Systems Design
subject: EEE
description: Covers hardware and software aspects of designing embedded systems, including microcontrollers and real-time programming.

title: Advanced Control Systems
subject: EEE
description: Study of modern control techniques, including adaptive control, nonlinear control, and optimal control.

title: Digital Signal Processing
subject: EEE
description: Principles of digital signal processing including filtering, Fourier analysis, and DSP applications.

title: Introduction to Renewable Energy Systems
subject: EEE
description: Fundamentals of renewable energy technologies, including solar, wind, and biomass energy systems.

title: Power System Analysis
subject: EEE
description: Analysis and modeling of power systems, including power flow, fault analysis, and stability studies.

title: Machine Learning for Engineers
subject: EEE
description: Application of machine learning techniques to engineering problems, covering regression, classification, and clustering.

title: Quantum Computing Fundamentals
subject: CSE
description: Introduction to quantum computing concepts, algorithms, and applications in areas such as cryptography and optimization.

title: Bioinformatics Algorithms
subject: CSE
description: Computational techniques in bioinformatics, including sequence alignment, gene prediction, and phylogenetic analysis.

title: Ethics in Technology
subject: CSE
description: Examines ethical considerations in technology development, including AI ethics, privacy, and social impacts.

title: Microeconomics Theory
subject: ECN
description: Introduction to microeconomic principles including supply and demand, consumer behavior, and market structures.

title: Macroeconomics
subject: ECN
description: Explores aggregate economic behavior, covering GDP, inflation, unemployment, and fiscal policy.

title: Materials Characterization
subject: MSE
description: Introduction to techniques for characterizing materials, including microscopy, spectroscopy, and X-ray diffraction.

title: Thermodynamics of Materials
subject: MSE
description: Covers the thermodynamic principles relevant to material systems, phase equilibria, and material transformations.

title: Cell Biology
subject: BIO
description: Examines cellular structure and function, including cell organelles, cellular metabolism, and cell signaling.

title: Genetics and Evolution
subject: BIO

title: Introduction to Environmental Science
subject: ENV

title: Sustainable Energy
subject: ENV
description: Explores renewable energy sources and sustainable energy practices, including solar, wind, and bioenergy.

title: Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry
subject: CHM
description: Basic principles of organic chemistry including structure, bonding, and functional groups.

title: Physical Chemistry
subject: CHM
description: Study of physical principles in chemistry, covering thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, and spectroscopy.

title: International Economics
subject: ECN
description: Study of international trade, finance, exchange rates, and economic policies affecting global markets.

title: Polymeric Materials
subject: MSE
description: Covers properties, processing, and applications of polymeric materials used in engineering and manufacturing.

title: Human Physiology
subject: BIO
description: Examines human body systems and their functions, including circulatory, respiratory, and nervous systems.

title: Biomaterials
subject: MSE
description: Study of materials used in medical devices and tissue engineering, focusing on biocompatibility and material properties.

title: Ecology and Conservation Biology
subject: BIO
description: Principles of ecology, biodiversity, and conservation biology, focusing on ecosystems and environmental challenges.

title: Environmental Economics
subject: ECN

title: Organic Chemistry II
subject: CHM
description: Continues study of organic chemistry focusing on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, and spectroscopic techniques.

title: Advanced Structural Materials
subject: MSE
description: Study of high-performance materials used in engineering applications, focusing on mechanical properties and processing.

title: Economic Development
subject: ECN

subject: ENV

subject: ECN

subject: ECN

title: Econometrics

subject: CHM
description: In-depth study of organic synthesis, reaction mechanisms, and molecular structure.

subject: CHM

subject: ENV

subject: ENV

title: Advanced Materials Processing
subject: MSE

title: Nanomaterials
subject: MSE

subject: BIO

subject: BIO

subject: ENV

subject: BIO

subject: ENV

subject: BIO

subject: CHM

subject: PHY

subject: ENV

subject: BIO

subject: CHM

subject: GEO

subject: CSE

subject: CSE

subject: CSE
description: Study of embedded systems, including hardware-software integration, real-time processing, and microcontrollers.

subject: EEE
description: Basics of digital logic, including combinational and sequential circuits, Karnaugh maps, and Boolean algebra.

title: Power Systems Analysis
subject: EEE
description: Study of power generation, transmission, and distribution systems, as well as power flow analysis.

title: Signal Processing
subject: EEE

subject: CSE
description: Covers supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, support vector machines, and deep learning.

subject: CSE

subject: CSE
